text: Madiswil is a municipality in the administrative district of Oberaargau in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. Since January 1, 2007, Gutenburg is part of the municipality. On 1 January 2011, Kleindietwil and Leimiswil were merged with the municipality of Madiswil.Nomenklaturen â€“ Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 4 April 2011 ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of Madiswil Category:Municipalities in Oberaargau
